title: Designing a Simple URL Shortening Service: A TinyURL Approach
description:
**Design a URL shortening service**

Design a system for creating a URL shortening service similar to TinyURL. This service will generate concise aliases that redirect to the original, longer URLs. Notable examples of such services include bit.ly, ow.ly, and short.io.

title: Design Ticketmaster
description:
**Create an Online Ticketing Platform**

Imagine crafting a digital ticketing solution for the sale of movie tickets, akin to the functionalities of Ticketmaster or BookMyShow.

title: Design Twitter
description:
**Design Twitter**

Design a social networking service similar to Twitter. The platform's users will have the capability to compose and share tweets, track the updates of other users, and indicate their appreciation for specific tweets by favoriting them.

title: Design Facebook Messenger
description:
**Design Facebook Messenger**

Design a Web and Mobile Instant Messaging Service – Inspired by Facebook Messenger

title: Design an API Rate Limiter
description:
**Creating an API Rate Limiter**

Design an API Rate Limiter that controls user access by regulating the volume of requests they submit.

title: Design Youtube or Netflix
description:
**Design a Video Sharing Platform - YouTube or Netflix Style**

Design a video sharing service akin to YouTube, enabling users to both upload and watch videos, and perform searches to discover content.

title: Design Dropbox
description:
**Design Dropbox**

Let's design a file hosting service like Dropbox

title: Design Typeahead Suggestion
description:
**Design a Real-Time Text Suggestion System**

Design a dynamic suggestion service that offers users real-time recommendations for search terms while they input text. Similar Services includes Auto-suggestions and Typeahead search.

title: Design Uber Backend
description:
**Design an Infrastructure for Ride-Sharing Apps**

Formulate the architecture for a ride-sharing platform akin to Uber, serving as an intermediary between passengers seeking transportation and drivers with available vehicles.

title: Design Yelp or Nearby Friends
description:
**Design Yelp Location Service**

Design a platform similar to Yelp, enabling users to explore local establishments such as restaurants, theaters, and shopping centers. Additionally, users will have the capability to contribute reviews for these locations.

title: Design Facebook’s Newsfeed
description:
**Design Facebook's Newsfeed**

Design the Newsfeed feature for Facebook, encompassing a dynamic collection of posts, images, videos, and status updates originating from the profiles and pages that a user follows.

title: Design a Web Crawler
description:
**Designing a Web Crawler System**

Design a systeweb crawler tasked with methodically browsing and downloading content from the global internet.

title: Design Twitter Search
description:
**Design Twitter Search System**

Twitter is a social networking platform where users can exchange text-based messages, news, photos, and more. Design a service capable of both storing and efficiently retrieving user tweets.

title: Design Instagram
description:
**Design an Instagram-like Photo Sharing Service**

Design a platform akin to Instagram, which enables users to upload their photos for sharing with others.

title: Design Google Map
description:
**Design Google Map**

Design an application like Google Maps. This application should calculate things like the best possible path based on destination and how long it takes to reach our destination.

title: Design Google Doc
description:
**Design Google Doc**

Design a collaborative document editing service such as Google Docs or Etherpad.

title: Design an Online Chess Service
description:
**Design an online chess service**

Design a web-based service where users can play chess. Your system should support user sign-ups, pairing players for matches, real-time move updates, and a method to validate moves according to chess rules. It should also be capable of scaling to handle multiple simultaneous games. Outline the core components needed for this service and how they will interact to provide a seamless and responsive gaming experience.

title: Design an Efficient Parking Lot System
description:
**Design an Efficient Parking Lot System**

Imagine you're tasked with designing a modern parking lot system from scratch. Consider various factors such as space optimization, accessibility, security, and user experience. How would you architect a solution that efficiently manages vehicle entry, exit, and parking allocation? Your design should accommodate different types of vehicles, prioritize convenience for users, and incorporate features to enhance overall functionality and safety.

title: Design a Web Cache
description:
**Design a Web Cache**

Develop a web cache system (eg. Reverse Proxy Cache) that can be integrated with a web server to cache frequently accessed web content. The goal is to reduce the response time for user requests, minimize the load on the web server, and optimize network bandwidth usage. The system should be scalable, efficient, and maintain consistency with the original data source.

title: Design a Task Scheduler
description:
**Design a Task Scheduler**

Develop a task scheduler system that allows users to schedule tasks to be executed once at a specified time in the future or on a recurring basis using specified intervals. The system should efficiently manage and execute thousands of tasks with minimal delay and high reliability.

title: Design a Fitness Tracking App
description:
**Design a Fitness Tracking App**

Build an app that allows users to track their physical activities, set goals, and monitor progress.

title: Design a Weather Reporting System
description:
**Design a Weather Reporting System**

Develop a system that provides users with current weather information for a specified location.

title: Design an Automated Trading Platform
description:
**Design an Automated Trading Platform**

Design a platform that leverages algorithms to execute trades in financial markets with minimal human intervention. The platform should analyze market data in real-time, apply pre-defined trading strategies, and make decisions based on risk management rules. Key features include high-frequency trading capabilities, backtesting tools to evaluate strategies on historical data, and security measures to protect against market volatility and unauthorized access. The goal is to maximize profitability and efficiency for traders and financial institutions.

title: Design a Key Value Store
description:
**Design a Key Value Store**

Design a high-performance, distributed key-value store system that offers fast data access, scalability, and high availability. The system should support operations such as set, get, delete, and conditional updates with minimal latency. Features should include data replication across multiple nodes to ensure fault tolerance, partitioning to distribute data evenly across the cluster, and persistence options to safeguard data. The system must efficiently handle high volumes of read/write operations and provide consistency and durability guarantees. Examples include, Redis or DynamoDB.

title: Design a Cloud Infrastructure for Tech Enterprises
description:
**Design a Cloud Infrastructure for Tech Enterprises**

Design a scalable, secure, and resilient cloud infrastructure tailored for technology enterprises. This infrastructure should support a wide range of computing needs, including high-performance computing, big data analytics, and enterprise-grade applications. The design must consider aspects such as multi-cloud integration, automation for deployment and scaling, robust security measures to protect data and applications, and efficient resource management to optimize costs.

title: Design a Container Orchestration System
description:
**Design a Container Orchestration System**

Design a system to manage the lifecycle of containers in a distributed environment. This system should automate deployment, scaling, and operations of application containers across clusters of hosts. It must ensure high availability, facilitate microservices architecture, and provide efficient resource utilization. Key features include container scheduling, load balancing, self-healing in case of failures, and seamless integration with continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.

title: Design a High-Performance Computing Cluster
description:
**Design a High-Performance Computing Cluster**

Configure a high-performance computing (HPC) cluster designed to tackle complex computational problems across various scientific, engineering, and research domains. The cluster should leverage parallel processing to enhance computing power and efficiency. Key considerations include selecting appropriate hardware (CPUs, GPUs, networking), optimizing for specific workloads, ensuring scalability, and implementing software tools for job scheduling and resource management. The configuration must also address power consumption, cooling requirements, and system reliability.

title: Design a Cloud Based Data Backup Solution
description:
**Design a Cloud Based Data Backup Solution**

Architect a cloud-based solution for secure and reliable data backup, ensuring businesses can recover critical data in the event of system failures, cyber attacks, or other data loss incidents. The solution should support automatic backup schedules, incremental backups to minimize storage needs, and quick data restoration. It must provide robust security features, including end-to-end encryption and access controls, and offer scalability to accommodate growing data volumes.

title: Design a Cloud Storage Gateway
description:
**Design a Cloud Storage Gateway**

Create a cloud storage gateway that seamlessly connects on-premises storage systems with cloud storage services, providing businesses with a hybrid storage solution. The gateway should offer caching, encryption, and data compression features to optimize data transfer speeds and security. It must support various storage protocols and be compatible with multiple cloud storage providers, enabling businesses to leverage cloud storage benefits without major changes to existing infrastructure.

title: Design a Virtualization System
description:
**Design a Virtualization System**

Develop a system that allows multiple virtual machines (VMs) to run on a single physical hardware host, effectively separating the hardware from the software layer. This system should support various operating systems and applications on the same physical hardware, optimizing resource utilization and providing greater flexibility in managing IT resources. Key aspects include efficient resource allocation, isolation between VMs, and tools for managing virtualized environments. The system should also ensure high performance, security, and scalability, catering to the needs of data centers and cloud environments.

title: Design a Disaster Recovery System
description:
**Design a Disaster Recovery System**

Develop a comprehensive disaster recovery plan for IT systems that minimizes data loss and downtime in the event of a disaster. This plan should encompass data backup, system replication, and failover procedures to ensure business continuity. The strategy must include risk assessment, identify critical assets, define recovery objectives, and establish clear roles and responsibilities. It should also detail the process for testing and updating the disaster recovery plan regularly.

title: Design a Hybrid Cloud Infrastructure
description:
**Design a Hybrid Cloud Infrastructure**

Architect a hybrid cloud infrastructure that combines on-premises, private cloud, and public cloud services with seamless integration and movement between platforms. This design should offer the flexibility to run applications and store data in the most appropriate environment based on cost, performance, and security requirements. Key elements include secure connectivity, data governance, compliance considerations, and a management layer that provides a unified view and control over the hybrid landscape. The infrastructure should support scalability, disaster recovery, and workload portability.

title: Design a Cloud Service Brokerage Platform
description:
**Design a Cloud Service Brokerage Platform**

Develop a platform that acts as an intermediary between cloud service providers and businesses, simplifying the process of selecting, purchasing, and managing cloud services. This platform should provide tools for comparing offerings, managing subscriptions, and integrating services from multiple providers. Additionally, it should offer value-added services like cost optimization advice, compliance management, and technical support to help businesses maximize their cloud investments.

title: Design a Serverless Architecture Framework
description:
**Design a Serverless Architecture Framework**

Design a framework that enables developers to build and deploy applications without managing underlying infrastructure, focusing on executing code in response to events. The framework should abstract the server management, automatically scale with the application's needs, and charge based on actual resource consumption. Key features include support for multiple programming languages, integration with external services and databases, and tools for monitoring and debugging. The design must ensure security, reliability, and performance, enabling rapid development and deployment cycles.

title: Design a Global Content Distribution Network
description:
**Design a Global Content Distribution Network**

Architect a content distribution network (CDN) that delivers web content and services to users based on their geographic location, the origin of the content, and the content delivery server. The network should optimize for speed, reliability, and security, effectively handling peak traffic loads and protecting against cyber threats. Key components include a distributed network of edge servers, caching strategies, load balancing, and robust security measures. The CDN must ensure fast content delivery, reduce bandwidth costs, and improve user experience across global locations.

title: Design a Large-Scale Graph Processing System
description:
**Design a Large-Scale Graph Processing System**

Architect a system optimized for processing and analyzing large graph datasets, capable of handling complex operations like pathfinding, community detection, and network analysis. This system should support distributed computing to scale with the size of the graph data, ensuring efficient processing of billions of nodes and edges. It's crucial for enabling insights into social networks, biological networks, and knowledge graphs, requiring robustness, scalability, and high-performance computing capabilities.

title: Design a Peer-to-Peer Network
description:
**Design a Peer-to-Peer Network**

Develop a peer-to-peer (P2P) network that allows computers to directly share resources without relying on a centralized server. The network should support efficient data discovery, distribution, and redundancy, handling dynamic joining and leaving of nodes. Key challenges include implementing robust mechanisms for peer discovery, data integrity, and fairness in resource sharing. The design should address security concerns, such as data encryption and protection against malicious nodes, ensuring a reliable and secure environment for users to share and access data.

title: Design a Big Data Processing Pipeline
description:
**Design a Big Data Processing Pipeline**

Design a scalable system for managing and processing large volumes of diverse data. This pipeline should efficiently ingest, process, and analyze data to deliver actionable insights. It must handle real-time and batch data, ensuring high throughput and low latency, with a focus on data integrity and accessibility for analytics and decision-making.

title: Design a Distributed Messaging System
description:
**Design a Distributed Messaging System**

Develop a scalable and reliable messaging system that facilitates asynchronous communication between different parts of an application, even across distributed environments. The system should guarantee message delivery, support various messaging patterns (like publish/subscribe, request/reply), and handle high volumes of messages with minimal latency. It must also ensure fault tolerance and provide mechanisms for message tracking and recovery. Examples include Kafka and RabbitMQ.

title: Design a Distributed File System
description:
**Design a Distributed File System**

Develop a file system that manages files across multiple machines, providing users and applications with concurrent access to data stored on a network of servers. This system should ensure data integrity, reliability, and high availability, supporting features like replication, fault tolerance, and distributed locking. The design must accommodate large data volumes, provide mechanisms for efficient data distribution and retrieval, and maintain performance and scalability as the system grows. Examples include, Goolge filesystem, Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFS), Amazon S3 and Microsoft Azure Blob Storage.

title: Design a Log Collection and Analysis System
description:
**Design a Log Collection and Analysis System**

Build a system that aggregates logs from various sources within an IT infrastructure, processes them, and analyzes the data to provide insights into system health, performance issues, and security threats. The system should support real-time processing and alerting, scalable storage for log data, and powerful analysis tools to derive actionable intelligence. It's essential for the system to handle large volumes of log data efficiently and offer intuitive interfaces for monitoring and analysis. Examples of such system includes Splunk and Datadog.

title: Design a Load Balancer
description:
**Design a Load Balancer**

Create a load balancer that efficiently distributes incoming network traffic across a group of web servers to ensure scalability and high availability of websites or applications. The design should include algorithms for traffic distribution, such as round-robin, least connections, or IP hash, considering session persistence when necessary. The load balancer should monitor the health of web servers to reroute traffic away from failed servers and provide SSL termination for secure connections. It must offer easy integration with existing infrastructure and support for automatic scaling.

title: Design a Scalable Email Service
description:
**Design a Scalable Email Service**

Design an email service capable of handling high volumes of email sending and receiving, ensuring deliverability, and managing email-related tasks efficiently. The system should support features like email composition, delivery status tracking, spam detection, and automated responses. Scalability is critical to accommodate fluctuating volumes, and the architecture should include load balancing, distributed processing, and storage solutions. Additionally, the system must ensure high availability, data security, and compliance with email sending standards and regulations.

title: Design a Food Delivery Service
description:
**Design a Food Delivery Service**

Create an efficient food delivery service that connects users with restaurants and delivers orders to their doorstep. Design intuitive interfaces for browsing menus, placing orders, and tracking deliveries in real-time. Implement features like order customization, secure payment processing, and driver tracking to ensure a seamless and satisfying food delivery experience for users and restaurants alike. Examples include Doordash and Uber Eats.

title: Design a Hotel Booking Service
description:
**Design a Hotel Booking Service**

Design a comprehensive hotel booking system that simplifies the process of finding and booking accommodations for travelers. Create user-friendly interfaces for searching, comparing, and booking hotels based on preferences and budget. Prioritize features like real-time availability updates, secure payment processing, and personalized recommendations to enhance user satisfaction and streamline hotel booking experiences. Examples include booking.com and Airbnb.

title: Design an Auction system
description:
**Design an Auction Service**

Develop a robust auction system that facilitates bidding and purchasing of items through competitive auctions. Design intuitive interfaces for users to list items, place bids, and manage auctions. Prioritize features like real-time bidding, auction notifications, and secure transaction processing to ensure a transparent and efficient auction experience for buyers and sellers. An example of a company that offers this feature would be Ebay.

title: Design an E-commerce Service
description:
**Design an E-commerce Service**

Create a comprehensive e-commerce website inspired by Amazon, offering a wide range of products, personalized recommendations, and seamless shopping experiences. Design user-friendly interfaces for product discovery, browsing, and purchasing. Implement features like user accounts, secure payment processing, and order tracking to enhance user satisfaction and drive sales.

title: Design an Inventory Management System
description:
**Design an Inventory Management System**

Design a scalable inventory management system for businesses to track and manage their inventory efficiently. Create interfaces for inventory tracking, stock replenishment, and order fulfillment. Prioritize features like real-time inventory updates, automated stock alerts, and integration with sales channels to optimize inventory control and streamline operations.

title: Design an Online Payment Service
description:
**Design an Online Payment Service**

Develop a secure and reliable online payment system similar to PayPal, enabling users to send and receive payments electronically. Design interfaces for account management, fund transfers, and payment processing. Implement features like fraud detection, buyer and seller protection, and multi-currency support to ensure secure and seamless transactions for users worldwide.

title: Design Spotify
description:
**Design Spotify**

Craft a modern music streaming service reminiscent of Spotify, offering users an extensive library of songs, personalized playlists, and social sharing capabilities. Focus on intuitive music discovery, seamless cross-device synchronization, and high audio quality. Ensure reliability and optimal performance to provide an unparalleled streaming experience for music enthusiasts.

title: Design a Live Video Streaming Platform
description:
**Design a Live Video Streaming Platform**

Design a live video streaming platform that provides a captivating experience across various genres. Incorporate real-time interaction features, audience engagement tools, and effective content moderation. Emphasize scalability, reliability, and high-quality streaming to deliver an immersive viewing experience for users worldwide.

title: Design a Video Conferencing system
description:
**Design a Video Conferencing system**

Develop a comprehensive video conferencing system that enables seamless communication and collaboration across remote teams. Design intuitive interfaces for scheduling meetings, joining calls, and sharing content. Prioritize security, reliability, and scalability to support various use cases and accommodate diverse user needs.

title: Design a Virtual Reality Streaming Service
description:
**Design a Virtual Reality Streaming Service**

Design an immersive virtual reality streaming service that transports users to virtual worlds and experiences. Create intuitive interfaces for browsing, selecting, and streaming VR content. Focus on optimizing latency, bandwidth, and resolution for a seamless VR experience. Implement social features, interactive elements, and cross-platform compatibility to enhance user engagement and immersion.

title: Design an Ebook Distribution Platform
description:
**Design an Ebook Distribution Platform**

Develop an efficient ebook distribution platform catering to authors, publishers, and readers. Design user-friendly interfaces for uploading, managing, and distributing ebooks across multiple devices and platforms. Prioritize features like secure digital rights management, seamless content delivery, and personalized recommendations to enhance user experience and maximize reach.

title: Design a Chatbot Framework
description:
**Design a Chatbot Framework**

Develop a flexible and extensible chatbot framework that enables businesses to create and deploy conversational agents across various platforms. Design components for natural language understanding, dialogue management, and integration with backend systems. Prioritize features like multi-channel support, context awareness, and analytics capabilities to empower businesses to build sophisticated chatbot applications tailored to their specific use cases.

title: Design a Push Notification Service
description:
**Design a Push Notification Service**

Design a robust push notification system for delivering timely and relevant notifications to users across various devices and platforms. Develop components for message targeting, delivery scheduling, and performance monitoring. Prioritize features like personalization, localization, and user engagement tracking to optimize the effectiveness of push notifications and enhance user experiences.

title: Design a Blockchain Based System
description:
**Design a Blockchain-Based System**

Develop a blockchain-based system that leverages decentralized ledger technology to securely record and verify transactions across a network of nodes. Design components for consensus mechanisms, smart contracts, and data encryption. Prioritize features like immutability, transparency, and scalability to enable secure and efficient peer-to-peer transactions and data management.

title: Design a Web Analytics Tool
description:
**Design a Web Analytics Tool**

Create a web analytics tool akin to Google Analytics that enables website owners to track and analyze visitor behavior and website performance. Design components for data collection, reporting, and visualization. Prioritize features like traffic analysis, conversion tracking, and audience segmentation to provide actionable insights and optimize website effectiveness and user experience.

title: Design a Public Transportation System
description:
**Design a Public Transportation System**

Design a public transportation system that provides efficient and accessible transportation services to passengers within urban or regional areas. Develop components for route planning, scheduling, and fare collection. Prioritize features like real-time vehicle tracking, passenger information displays, and multi-modal integration to enhance mobility and accessibility for commuters while minimizing congestion and environmental impact.

title: Design a Language Translation Service
description:
**Design a Language Translation Service**

Create a language translation service that accurately translates text and speech between different languages. Design interfaces for inputting text or audio, selecting target languages, and receiving translated output. Prioritize features like machine translation algorithms, language detection, and multilingual support to provide users with reliable and efficient language translation capabilities for various communication needs.

title: Design a Smart Home System
description:
**Design a Smart Home System**

Create a smart home system that enables users to control and automate various devices and appliances within their homes. Design interfaces for device management, scheduling, and remote access. Prioritize features like voice control, energy management, and home security integration to enhance comfort, convenience, and efficiency for homeowners while ensuring seamless interoperability and data privacy.

title: Design a Task Management Application
description:
**Design a Task Management Application**

Develop a task management application that helps individuals and teams organize, prioritize, and track tasks and projects effectively. Design interfaces for task creation, assignment, and progress monitoring. Prioritize features like task categorization, deadline reminders, and collaboration tools to improve productivity and coordination among users while providing a seamless and intuitive user experience.

title: Design a Voting System
description:
**Design a Voting System**

Develop a secure and reliable voting system that enables users to cast votes electronically for various elections or polls. Design components for voter authentication, ballot creation, and result tabulation. Prioritize features like ballot secrecy, auditability, and resilience to fraud to ensure the integrity and transparency of the voting process while maintaining voter privacy and trust in the electoral system.

title: Design a Secure Identity Management System
description:
**Design a Secure Identity Management System**

Develop a secure identity management system that enables organizations to manage and authenticate user identities securely. Design components for user authentication, access control, and identity federation. Prioritize features like multi-factor authentication, single sign-on, and identity lifecycle management to ensure secure and efficient access to resources while minimizing security risks associated with identity theft and unauthorized access.

title: Design a Network Security Monitoring Tool
description:
**Design a Network Security Monitoring Tool**

Design a network security monitoring tool that provides comprehensive visibility into network traffic and detects potential security threats. Develop components for packet capture, traffic analysis, and threat intelligence integration. Prioritize features like intrusion detection, anomaly detection, and incident response automation to enhance network security posture and mitigate cyber risks.

title: Design a Real Time Sports Scoring System
description:
**Design a Real Time Sports Scoring System**

Develop a real-time sports scoring system that provides live updates and statistics for sporting events as they happen. Design interfaces for scoreboards, player statistics, and game timelines. Prioritize features like data streaming, event detection, and visualizations to deliver accurate and engaging real-time updates for fans and viewers.

title: Design a Real Time Stock Trading Platform
description:
**Design a Real Time Stock Trading Platform**

Develop a robust real-time stock trading system that enables traders to buy and sell financial instruments instantly. Design components for order routing, market data processing, and trade execution. Prioritize features like low-latency trading, risk management tools, and compliance mechanisms to ensure fast and reliable transactions in dynamic market conditions.

title: Design a Podcast Hosting Platform
description:
**Design a Podcast Hosting Platform**

Create an innovative podcast hosting platform that empowers creators to share their content with audiences worldwide. Design user-friendly interfaces for uploading, managing, and distributing podcasts. Ensure scalability, robust storage solutions, and analytics tools for content creators to track performance and audience engagement.

title: Design Pastebin
description:
**Design Pastebin**

Design a Pastebin-like service. Pastebin is a website where you can store text online for a set period of time.

title: Design Shopify
description:
**Design Shopify**

Design a platform like Shopify. Shopify enables individuals and businesses to create and manage online stores effortlessly. The platform should support a wide range of e-commerce activities, including product management, inventory tracking, order processing, payment integration, and customer management.

title: Design a Digital Wallet
description:
**Design a Digital Wallet**

Develop a digital wallet system that provides a secure, intuitive, and seamless way for users to manage their digital transactions. The system should enable users to store money in a digital format, make online and offline payments, send and receive money from peers, and integrate with various financial services and merchants.

title: Design a Code Deployment System
description:
**Design a Code Deployment System**

Develop a scalable and automated code deployment system that enables continuous integration and continuous deployment of software applications. The system should support version control integration, automated testing, environment management, and seamless deployment to various environments (development, testing, staging, and production).

title: Design a Live Comment System
description:
**Design a Live Comment System**

Develop a scalable, real-time live comments system that enables users to post and view comments instantaneously. The system should support high volumes of users and messages, provide real-time updates to all participants, and maintain a high level of performance and reliability.

title: Design a Distributed Counter
description:
**Design a Distributed Counter**

Develop a distributed counter system that allows for high-frequency increment and decrement operations across a distributed environment. The system should ensure accuracy, high availability, scalability, and eventual consistency, with minimal latency in count updates and retrieval.

title: Design a Distributed Locking System
description:
**Design a Distributed Locking System**

Develop a highly available, reliable, and scalable distributed locking service that enables distributed applications to acquire, hold, and release locks on shared resources across a distributed system. The service should prevent deadlocks, minimize latency, and ensure fairness in lock acquisition.

title: Design Google Search
description:
**Design Google Search**

Develop a search engine system that can efficiently index billions of web pages, process complex search queries, and return relevant and accurate search results almost instantaneously. The system should be scalable to accommodate the continuously growing size of the web and capable of updating its indices in real-time or near-real-time to reflect the latest content.

title: Design a Nested Comments System
description:
**Design a Nested Comments System**

Develop a scalable and efficient system for managing nested comments, enabling users to engage in discussions by posting comments and replying to other comments in a hierarchical manner. The system should support real-time updates, preserve the order and structure of the conversation, and ensure a seamless user experience across various devices.

title: Design a Scheduled Digital Transaction System
description:
**Design a Scheduled Digital Transaction System**

Develop a scalable, secure, and user-friendly system that enables individuals and businesses to schedule and automate the execution of digital financial transactions. The system should support various types of transactions, including one-time payments, recurring payments, and conditional transactions based on specific triggers or criteria.

title: Design a Platform Like Reddit
description:
**Design a Platform Like Reddit**

Develop a scalable, efficient, and user-friendly platform that allows users to submit content (links, text posts), vote on these submissions (upvotes and downvotes), and participate in threaded discussions. The system should support a wide array of topics, manage user communities (subreddits), and ensure content relevance and quality through user moderation and algorithms.

title: Design an Online Presence Indicator Service
description:
**Design an Online Presence Indicator Service**

Develop a scalable and efficient online presence indicator Service that can accurately reflect the real-time online status of users across a platform. The service should support various statuses, including online, idle, and offline, and update these statuses dynamically based on user activity or inactivity.

title: Design a Distributed Linked List
description:
**Design a Distributed Linked List**

Develop a distributed linked list system that maintains a sequence of elements distributed across multiple nodes in a network, ensuring efficient and reliable operations under the constraints of a distributed environment. The system should support operations such as insertion, deletion, and traversal while providing scalability, fault tolerance, and consistency.

title: Design a Vending Machine System
description:
**Design a Vending Machine System**

Develop an automated, efficient, and user-friendly vending machine system capable of dispensing a variety of products upon receiving the correct payment. The system should support multiple payment methods, provide intuitive user interaction for product selection, manage inventory, and ensure secure transactions.

title: Design a CAPTCHA System
description:
**Design a CAPTCHA System**

Develop a CAPTCHA system that effectively distinguishes between human users and automated bots, minimizing the potential for automated abuse and enhancing the security of web applications. The system should balance the need for strong security measures with the importance of user accessibility and convenience.

title: Design a Distributed OLTP Database
description:
**Design a Distributed OLTP Database**

Develop a scalable, high-performance, and fault-tolerant distributed OLTP database system that supports efficient processing of high volumes of transactions. The system must ensure data consistency, durability, and availability across distributed environments, accommodating the needs of applications requiring real-time access and manipulation of data.

title: Design a Distributed Tracing System
description:
**Design a Distributed Tracing System**

Develop a comprehensive distributed tracing system that provides visibility into the lifecycle of requests and transactions across microservices and distributed components. The system should enable developers and operators to trace the execution path of requests, identify performance bottlenecks, and diagnose failures or latency issues in a distributed architecture.

title: Design a Tagging Service
description:
**Design a Tagging Service**

Develop a scalable, flexible, and user-friendly tagging service that enables efficient categorization and retrieval of digital items through the use of tags. The system should support tagging across various types of content, allow for easy management and searchability of tags, and provide mechanisms for tag suggestions and normalization.

title: Design a Parking Lot
description:
**Desgin a Parking Lot**

Design a parking lot system to manage vehicle parking across multiple floors. Include features for parking spot assignment based on vehicle size, spot availability checking, and fee calculation based on parking duration.

title: Design a Visual Search System
description:
**Design a Visual Search System**

Design a visual search system similar what Pinterest uses. A visual search system helps users discover images that are visually similar to a selected image.

title: Design a Database Batch Auditing Service
description:
**Design a Database Batch Auditing Service**

Design a system that can efficiently audit batches of database transactions to ensure data integrity, compliance with predefined rules, and historical correctness. The service should be able to handle large volumes of data and provide detailed reports on the audits.

title: Design a Distributed Unique Id Generator
description:
Design a Distributed Unique Id Generator

Design a distributed unique ID generator that can produce unique identifiers at high throughput across multiple nodes without collisions and minimal synchronization overhead.

title: Design Craigslist
description:
**Design Craigslist**

Design and implement a simplified version of Craigslist with essential functionalities that allow users to post, view, edit, and delete advertisements. Your design should focus on user-friendliness, efficiency, and scalability.

title: Design a Wide Column Database
description:
**Design a Wide Column Database**

Design a conceptual model of a wide column database that can handle vast amounts of variable schema data efficiently. Your design should focus on optimizing data retrieval and storage efficiency while supporting scalability.

title: Design an Online Coupon Service Like Honey
description:
**Design an Online Coupon Service Like Honey**

Develop an online coupon service like honey that automatically finds and applies coupon codes during online shopping checkouts. The service should also offer price comparison, deal alerts, and a rewards program to enhance user engagement and loyalty.

title: Design a Metrics Monitoring and Alerting System
description:
**Design a Metrics Monitoring and Alerting System**

Design and implement a robust metrics monitoring and alerting system that can collect, analyze, and visualize performance data from multiple sources, and trigger alerts based on predefined thresholds or anomalies.

title: Design a Flash Sale System
description:
**Design a Flash Sale System**

Design and implement a highly scalable flash sale system that can handle massive spikes in user traffic and concurrent purchases without crashing or slowing down significantly. The system should ensure fair access to deals and accurate handling of inventory.

title: Design a Domain Name System
description:
**Design a Domain Name System**

Develop a DNS that handles domain name resolution, data storage, and security protocols efficiently. The system must be scalable to manage growth in demand and resilient against various security threats.

title: Design an ATM Machine System
description:
**Design an ATM Machine System**

Develop a secure, user-friendly, and reliable ATM system that allows bank customers to conduct various financial transactions independently, without the need for teller assistance.

title: Design a Meeting Calendar System
description:
**Design a Meeting Calendar System**

Develop an intuitive and efficient meeting calendar system that facilitates the scheduling, management, and tracking of meetings for individuals and teams within an organization.

title: Design a Collaboration Tool for Team Communication
description:
**Design a Collaboration Tool for Team Communication**

Develop a comprehensive collaboration platform that facilitates seamless communication, file sharing, and workflow management for teams of all sizes, fostering a productive and connected work environment.

title: Design a Webhook Notification Service
description:
**Design a Webhook Notification Service**

Develop a webhook system that securely receives and processes notifications of various payment events from a payment gateway to a server. The system should validate and handle events such as payment successes, failures, and chargebacks, triggering appropriate actions within the application based on the event data received.

title: Design a Frequently Viewed Products Feature for an E-commerce Platform
description:
**Design a Frequently Viewed Products Feature for an E-commerce Platform**

Develop a system that identifies and displays products frequently viewed together by customers on an e-commerce website, enhancing product discoverability and potentially increasing cross-selling opportunities.

title: Design a Multi-Device Screenshot Capture System
description:
**Design a Multi-Device Screenshot Capture System**

Develop a versatile and user-friendly system capable of capturing, storing, and managing screenshots from a variety of devices, including desktops, laptops, tablets, and smartphones.

title: Design a Network Connection Path Analyzer
description:
**Design a Network Connection Path Analyzer**

Develop a system that calculates the number of connections (hops) between two users in a professional network, similar to LinkedIn's feature. This system should efficiently determine and display the shortest path of connections, helping users understand their network reach and discover potential contacts.

title: Design an Employee Swap System
description:
**Design an Employee Swap System**

Develop a user-friendly platform that enables employees to trade shifts with each other, offering flexibility in scheduling while ensuring operational needs are met.

title: Design an E-commerce Recommendation System
description:
**Design an E-commerce Recommendation System**

Develop a recommendation engine for an e-commerce platform that personalizes user experiences by suggesting products based on individual browsing habits, purchase history, and preferences. The system should enhance user engagement, increase sales, and improve customer satisfaction.

title: Design an Air Traffic Control System
description:
**Design an Air Traffic Control System**

Develop a comprehensive air traffic control system that manages the full spectrum of air traffic operations, ensuring safety, efficiency, and reliability in the coordination of air traffic on the ground and in the air.

title: Design a Digital Distribution Platform for Applications
description:
**Design a Digital Distribution Platform for Applications**

Develop a comprehensive digital platform for distributing and managing mobile applications, providing developers and users a robust ecosystem for app publishing, discovery, and installation.

title: Design a Competitive Programming Platform
description:
**Design a Competitive Programming Platform**

Develop a robust online platform that hosts programming challenges and contests, enabling coders worldwide to engage in competitive programming, enhance their skills, and participate in a global coding community.

title: Design a Fresh Grocery Delivery System
description:
**Design a Fresh Grocery Delivery System**

Develop an online platform that connects consumers with local grocery stores and farmers to facilitate the ordering and delivery of fresh groceries, emphasizing speed, quality, and convenience.

title: Design a Movie Reviews Aggregator System
description:
**Design a Movie Reviews Aggregator System**

Create a centralized platform that collects and presents movie reviews from various sources, providing users with a comprehensive and balanced view of movies’ critical reception.

title: Design a Collaborative Meeting Scheduler
description:
**Design a Collaborative Meeting Scheduler**

Implement a dynamic meeting organizer system that allows users to schedule, modify, and manage meetings seamlessly across various platforms. This system should integrate with existing calendar applications, provide notifications, and support multiple time zones, ensuring efficient coordination among participants.

title: Design a Server Architecture for Serving Geospatial Images
description:
**Design a Server Architecture for Serving Geospatial Images**

Develop a server infrastructure that efficiently stores, processes, and serves high-resolution geospatial imagery to users for a mapping service similar to Google Maps, ensuring rapid load times and high reliability across global access points.

title: Design a QR Code System for a Grocery Shop
description:
**Design a QR Code System for a Grocery Shop**

Develop a QR code-based system to enhance customer experience by enabling self-service operations in a grocery store. This system will allow customers to scan QR codes for product information, self-checkout, and accessing promotions.

title: Design a Top-K Request Analysis System
description:
**Design a Top-K Request Analysis System**

Construct a scalable system that monitors and analyzes web traffic to determine the top 'k' most frequent requests within a specified time interval. This system must handle large-scale data inflows, ensure rapid query response, and allow for flexible adjustments of both the 'k' value and the time intervals of interest.

title: Design a Conference Room Booking System
description:
**Design a Conference Room Booking System**

Develop an intuitive and efficient system for reserving conference rooms within an organization, facilitating easy access to available spaces, managing bookings, and optimizing room usage.

title: Design an Order Tracking System
description:
**Design an Order Tracking System**

Create a comprehensive system that allows both businesses and customers to monitor the status of orders in real-time, from placement through delivery, enhancing transparency and improving customer satisfaction.

title: Design a Collaborative Online Spreadsheet System
description:
**Design a Collaborative Online Spreadsheet System**

Create a versatile and user-friendly online spreadsheet application that allows multiple users to view, edit, and manage spreadsheets in real time, facilitating collaboration across different locations and platforms.

title: Design a Video View Count System
description:
**Design a Video View Count System**

Create a robust and scalable system capable of accurately counting and displaying the number of views for video content, akin to YouTube's view-count feature. The system should handle high traffic volumes, prevent fraudulent views, and provide real-time updates to content creators and viewers.

title: Design a Graph Search Function for a Social Network
description:
**Design a Graph Search Function for a Social Network**

Develop a comprehensive graph search system that allows users to query and discover interconnected data within a social network, such as people, places, interests, and activities, in a way that is intuitive, personalized, and efficient.

title: Design an Airport Baggage Handling System
description:
**Design an Airport Baggage Handling System**

Develop a sophisticated baggage handling system that ensures efficient, secure, and timely sorting and transportation of passenger luggage from check-in to the appropriate flight, and from incoming flights to baggage reclaim.

title: Design a Resource Allocation Service
description:
**Design a Resource Allocation Service**

You are tasked with designing a resource allocation service for a company that manages a large number of servers.

Each server's capabilities and configurations are described by up to 1000 feature flags, such as OS, CPU, memory, and storage size.

Users of this service will request, reserve, and release (i.e., un-reserve or deallocate) these servers based on the feature flags. The service must efficiently match these requests with available servers.

title: Design a Warehouse Management System
description:
**Design a Warehouse Management System**

Design a system to manage inventory in a warehouse. The system should track stock levels, manage orders, handle incoming and outgoing shipments, and optimize storage locations.

title: Design a Banking System
description:
**Design a Banking System**

Design a system that manages customer bank accounts, transactions, and services like loans and credit cards. The system should handle user authentication, account management, transaction processing, and fraud detection.

title: Design a Vending Machine
description:
**Design a Vending Machine**

Design a vending machine that can dispense various items. The system should manage inventory, handle different types of payments (coins, cash, cards), and provide maintenance alerts.

title: Design a File Sharing Platform
description:
**Design a File Sharing Platform**

Design a system that allows users to upload, share, and collaborate on files. The system should manage user permissions, version control, file types, and large file handling. Consider features like cloud storage integration, sharing links, and access expiration.

title: Design a Food Delivery System
description:
**Design a Food Delivery System**

Design a system similar to DoorDash or UberEats, where users can order food from various restaurants. The system should manage user accounts, restaurant menus, orders, delivery tracking, and payments. Consider the coordination between restaurants, delivery personnel, and customers.

title: Design a Resource Management System
description:
**Design a Resource Management System**

Design a resource management system for efficient loading, caching, and unloading of game assets like textures and models. Focus on minimizing load times and optimizing memory usage during gameplay.

title: Design an Elevator System
description:
**Design an Elevator System**

Design an elevator control system for a building with multiple floors. The system should be able to handle multiple elevators, manage requests from users, optimize elevator movements, and handle different operational modes (e.g., maintenance, emergency).

title: Design an Online Shopping System
description:
**Design an Online Shopping System**

Design a system for an online shopping platform. The system should manage products, users, shopping carts, orders, and payments. Consider features like product search, reviews, discounts, and shipping options.

title: Design a File System
description:
**Design a File System**

Design a file system that supports operations like creating, reading, writing, and deleting files and directories. The file system should handle file permissions, different types of files (text, binary), and provide a hierarchical directory structure.

title: Design a Learning Management System
description:
**Design a Learning Management System**

Design a system for an online learning platform that allows instructors to create courses, students to enroll in courses, and both to track progress. Consider features like quizzes, assignments, grading, and certificates.

title: Design an ATM
description:
**Design an ATM**

Design an ATM machine that can handle various transactions like withdrawals, deposits, balance inquiries, and transfers. Consider security aspects, user authentication, and different types of accounts (savings, checking, etc.).

title: Design a Social Media Platform
description:
**Design a Social Media Platform**

Design a social media platform where users can create profiles, follow each other, post updates, like and comment on posts, and send direct messages. Consider scalability and the management of media content like images and videos.

title: Design an IoT Smart Home System
description:
**Design an IoT Smart Home System**

Design a system that manages connected devices in a smart home, such as thermostats, lights, and security cameras. The system should allow for automation, remote control, and integration with various home devices.

title: Design a Calendar System
description:
**Design a Calendar System**

Design a system for managing personal and shared calendars. The system should handle events, reminders, recurring events, time zones, and scheduling conflicts. Consider integration with email systems for sending invitations and managing RSVPs.

title: Design a Payment Gateway System
description:
**Design a Payment Gateway System**

Design a system that handles online payments, integrating with various payment methods like credit cards, debit cards, and digital wallets. The system should manage transactions, handle fraud detection, and provide APIs for merchants.

title: Design a Chess Game
description:
**Design a Chess Game**

Design a system for a chess game that can be played by two users. The system should enforce the rules of chess, manage the game state, and provide a user interface for playing the game.

title: Design a Notification System
description:
**Design a Notification System**

Design a system for handling notifications across various platforms (email, SMS, push notifications, etc.). The system should manage user preferences, scheduling, retry mechanisms, and provide APIs for other services to send notifications.

title: Design a Game State Management System
description:
**Design a Game State Management System**

Design a system to manage game states, including saving and loading player progress and in-game events. Ensure consistency and efficient state transitions across different game sessions.

title: Design a Hotel Booking System
description:
**Design a Hotel Booking System**

Design a system that allows users to search for and book hotel rooms. The system should manage rooms, bookings, cancellations, and payments. Consider seasonal pricing, room availability, and different room types (e.g., single, double, suite).

title: Design a Ride-Sharing Service
description:
**Design a Ride-Sharing Service**

Design a system similar to Uber or Lyft, where users can request rides, and drivers can accept ride requests. The system should handle user accounts, driver accounts, ride requests, trip tracking, and payments. Consider route optimization and surge pricing.

title: Design an Entity-Component System
description:
**Design an Entity-Component System**

Design an Entity-Component System (ECS) that allows game objects to be dynamically composed of various components at runtime. Focus on efficient data management and support for thousands of entities, while ensuring flexibility in adding and removing components.

title: Design a Library Management System
description:
**Design a Library Management System**

Design a system for a library that manages books, users, and transactions. The system should allow users to search for books, check out books, return books, and manage fines. Consider different roles like librarians and members and their specific permissions.

title: Design a Video Streaming Platform
description:
**Design a Video Streaming Platform**

Design a system like Netflix that streams video content to users. The system should handle content management, user subscriptions, content recommendations, and streaming at different quality levels.

title: Design an Event Lifecycle Management System
description:
**Design an Event Lifecycle Management System**

Design a scalable and fault-tolerant system to manage and analyze events with distinct start and end points. The system must ingest large volumes of event data from various services and support querying to determine the status of events at any given time (older than 24 hours), even when events arrive out of order or significantly delayed. An event can last up to one hour.

Key requirements:

- **Scalability**: The system must handle data volumes that cannot be stored on a single disk or managed by a single server, requiring a distributed and horizontally scalable architecture.
- **Out-of-Order and Delayed Events**: The system must handle events arriving out of order (e.g., an `endEvent` arriving before its corresponding `startEvent`) and also manage events that may arrive hours or days after they actually occurred.
- **APIs**:

  - `startEvent(event_id, timestamp)`: Record the start of an event.
  - `endEvent(event_id, timestamp)`: Record the end of an event.
  - `getOngoingEvents(timestamp)`: Return the count of events ongoing as of the specified timestamp. Can be called only for a timestamp older than 24 hours.

- **Data Storage**: Efficiently store event data, with appropriate indexing and sharding strategies, and optimize for querying the status of events.
- **Fault Tolerance**: Ensure the system is fault-tolerant and supports eventual consistency.

This problem focuses on designing a system that efficiently manages and queries event data, accommodating out-of-order and delayed events while ensuring scalability and fault tolerance.

title: Design a Web Crawler That Will Crawl Wikipedia
description:
**Design a Web Crawler That Will Crawl Wikipedia**

Design a web crawler that will crawl Wikipedia. We need to deploy the same software on each node. We have 10,000 nodes, the software can know about all the nodes. We have to minimize communication and make sure each node does equal amount of work.

title: Design an Ad Click Aggregation System
description:
**Design an Ad Click Aggregation System**

You are tasked with designing a large-scale Ad Click Aggregation System. This system needs to track and aggregate millions of ad clicks in real-time from various sources. The aggregated data will be used to provide insights such as the number of clicks each ad has received and help generate reports for advertisers on user engagement.

title: Design a Service to Allocate Pool of Resources Optimally
description:
**Design a Service to Allocate Pool of Resources Optimally**

Design a service to allocate pool of resources optimally. Resources could be of types - compute resources, storage resources. 500K customers should be able to use it concurrently.
